PHRASE.LANG: Known for his wisdom and loyalty, this dragon is a worthy companion to have at your side. [#Legal]
Célèbre pour sa sagesse et sa loyauté, ce dragon est un compagnon à toujours avoir à vos côtés. [#Legal]
Dieser Drache ist für seine Weisheit und seine Loyalität bekannt und ein wertvoller Begleiter an deiner Seite. [#Legal]
Noto per saggezza e fedeltà, questo drago è l'assistente ideale da tenere sempre al tuo fianco. [#Legal]
Célebre por su sabiduría y lealtad, este dragón es una mascota digna de acompañarte en todo momento. [#Legal]
현명함과 충직함으로 잘 알려진 이 용은 최고의 애완동물입니다. [#Legal]
Known for his wisdom and loyalty, this dragon is a worthy companion to have at your side. [#Legal]
這條龍以智慧及忠心見稱，是陪伴左右的最佳伴侶。 [#Legal]
這條龍以智慧及忠心見稱，是陪伴左右的最佳伴侶。 [#Legal]
Known for his wisdom and loyalty, this dragon is a worthy companion to have at your side. [#Legal]
